thread.title: Federer loses opening match at Shanghai Masters
thread.title_full: Federer loses opening match at Shanghai Masters

title: Federer loses opening match at Shanghai Masters
text: Federer loses opening match at Shanghai Masters Tuesday, 13 October 2015 (3 minutes ago) SHANGHAI (AP) Defending champion Roger Federer lost his opening match at the Shanghai Masters on Tuesday, falling to Spanish qualifier Albert Ramos-Vinolas 7-6 (4), 2-6, 6-3. Roger Federer was upset in his opening match at the Shanghai Masters on Tuesday by Spanish qualifier Albert Ramos-Vinolas 7-6 (4), 2-6, 6-3. MyNorthwest.com 2 hours ago - Sports Former U.S. Open champion Marin Cilic fought off a match point before rallying to defeat local hope Wu Di of China 4-6, 6-3, 7-6 (4) in the opening round of the... MyNorthwest.com 22 hours ago - Sports Nick Kyrgios has enjoyed a straightforward opening to his Shanghai Masters campaign but things quickly get harder with a match against Kei Nishikori next.
